title: First and second members of an ordered pair - misc additions

blocks.name: df1stres
blocks.content: Definition for a restriction of the ` 1st ` (first member of an ordered pair) function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm df1stres(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cres(c1st, cxp(c0, c1)), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cres(c1st, cxp(c0, c1)), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cv(s0)), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  3eqtr3ri(cres(c1st, cxp(c0, c1)), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), cres(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cxp(c0, c1)), cres(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cxp(c0, c1)))
  reseq1i(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cxp(c0, c1), cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)))
  df1st2(s0, s1, hs0)
  resoprab(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  eqtri(cres(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe)), cxp(c0, c1)), cres(c1st, cxp(c0, c1)), cres(c1st, cin(cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c0, c1))))
  resres(c1st, cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c0, c1))
  reseq2i(c1st, cin(cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1))
  eqtr3i(cin(cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  incom(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
  mpbi(wceq(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)), cxp(c0, c1)), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  xpss(c0, c1)
  df-ss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm df1stres(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (1st |`(c0 × c1))=(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ s0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtr4i((1st |`(c0 × c1)), (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ s0), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = s0)})
  3eqtr3ri((1st |`(c0 × c1)), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = s0)}, ({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > | hs0 = s0 } |`(c0 × c1)), ((1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))|`(c0 × c1)))
  reseq1i({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > | hs0 = s0 }, (c0 × c1), (1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  df1st2(s0, s1, hs0)
  resoprab(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, hs0 = s0)
  eqtri(((1st |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))|`(c0 × c1)), (1st |`(c0 × c1)), (1st |`((𝕌 × 𝕌)⋂(c0 × c1))))
  resres(c1st, (𝕌 × 𝕌), (c0 × c1))
  reseq2i(c1st, ((𝕌 × 𝕌)⋂(c0 × c1)), (c0 × c1))
  eqtr3i(((𝕌 × 𝕌)⋂(c0 × c1)), (c0 × c1), ((c0 × c1)⋂(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  incom((c0 × c1), (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  mpbi(((c0 × c1)⋂(𝕌 × 𝕌))=(c0 × c1), (c0 × c1)⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  xpss(c0, c1)
  df-ss((c0 × c1), (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
}

blocks.name: df2ndres
blocks.content: Definition for a restriction of the ` 2nd ` (second member of an ordered pair) function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm df2ndres(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cv(s1)), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  3eqtr3ri(cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), cres(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cxp(c0, c1)), cres(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), cxp(c0, c1)))
  reseq1i(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), cxp(c0, c1), cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)))
  df2nd2(s0, s1, hs0)
  resoprab(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  eqtri(cres(cres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe)), cxp(c0, c1)), cres(c2nd, cxp(c0, c1)), cres(c2nd, cin(cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c0, c1))))
  resres(c2nd, cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c0, c1))
  reseq2i(c2nd, cin(cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1))
  eqtr3i(cin(cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c0, c1)), cxp(c0, c1), cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  incom(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
  mpbi(wceq(cin(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)), cxp(c0, c1)), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  xpss(c0, c1)
  df-ss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, cv(s1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm df2ndres(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (2nd |`(c0 × c1))=(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtr4i((2nd |`(c0 × c1)), (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ s1), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = s1)})
  3eqtr3ri((2nd |`(c0 × c1)), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = s1)}, ({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > | hs0 = s1 } |`(c0 × c1)), ((2nd |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))|`(c0 × c1)))
  reseq1i({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > | hs0 = s1 }, (c0 × c1), (2nd |`(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  df2nd2(s0, s1, hs0)
  resoprab(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, hs0 = s1)
  eqtri(((2nd |`(𝕌 × 𝕌))|`(c0 × c1)), (2nd |`(c0 × c1)), (2nd |`((𝕌 × 𝕌)⋂(c0 × c1))))
  resres(c2nd, (𝕌 × 𝕌), (c0 × c1))
  reseq2i(c2nd, ((𝕌 × 𝕌)⋂(c0 × c1)), (c0 × c1))
  eqtr3i(((𝕌 × 𝕌)⋂(c0 × c1)), (c0 × c1), ((c0 × c1)⋂(𝕌 × 𝕌)))
  incom((c0 × c1), (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  mpbi(((c0 × c1)⋂(𝕌 × 𝕌))=(c0 × c1), (c0 × c1)⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
  xpss(c0, c1)
  df-ss((c0 × c1), (𝕌 × 𝕌))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
}

blocks.name: 1stpreimas
blocks.content: The preimage of a singleton. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1stpreimas(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, c0)), csn(c1)), cxp(csn(c1), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, c0)), csn(c1)), cxp(csn(c1), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3bitr4rd(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, c0)), csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c1), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  impbida(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  jca(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))
  eqtrd(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))))
  syl(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), c0, cop(c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))))
  eqtrd(cv(hs0), cop(c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))))
  ad2antrl(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))))
  1st2ndb(cv(hs0))
  opeq1d(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1, wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))))
  syl21anc(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  simplr(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))))))
  simprrr(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  biimpa(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0))
  elimasng(c1, c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)), c0)
  adantl(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1))
  ad2antrl(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1))
  biimpi(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1))
  jca(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))
  adantrr(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c0, cxp(universe, universe), wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  biimpi(wrel(c0), wss(c0, cxp(universe, universe)))
  df-rel(c0)
  jca(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csn(c1)), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0))), wrex(hs1, csn(c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0)))
  rspcedvd(hs1, csn(c1), c1, wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0), wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0))
  eqeltrrd(c1, csn(c1), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wceq(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1))
  elsn(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1)
  fvex(c1st, cv(hs0))
  eleq1d(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0, cop(c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  opeq1d(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1, wa(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpr(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  eqeltrrd(cop(c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  eqtrd(cv(hs0), cop(c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  ad2ant2r(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))))
  1st2nd(c0, cv(hs0))
  opeq1d(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1, wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  eqtr3d(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  ad2antrl(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), c0, c1st)
  simprr(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))
  simprl(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))
  df-rex(hs1, csn(c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs1), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0))
  elima3(hs1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0, csn(c1))
  fvex(c2nd, cv(hs0))
  a1i(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(csn(c1), cima(c0, csn(c1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), csn(c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), cima(c0, csn(c1)))))))
  elxp7(cv(hs0), csn(c1), cima(c0, csn(c1)))
  a1i(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, c0)), csn(c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, c0)), csn(c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))), wfn(cres(c1st, c0), c0))
  mp2an(wfn(cres(c1st, c0), c0), wfn(c1st, universe), wss(c0, universe))
  ax-mp(wfn(c1st, universe), wfo(c1st, universe, universe))
  fo1st()
  fofn(c1st, universe, universe)
  ssv(c0)
  fnssres(c1st, universe, c0)
  fniniseg(cres(c1st, c0), c0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, c0)), csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(csn(c1), cima(c0, csn(c1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wrel(c0), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(cres(c1st, c0), cv(hs0)), c1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cop(c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0))), c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: 1stpreima
blocks.content: The preimage by ` 1st ` is a 'vertical band'. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1stpreima(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c2))), c0), cxp(c0, c2)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c2))), c0), cxp(c0, c2), wss(c0, c1))
  3bitr4g(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c2))), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  syl6bb(wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  syl6rbbr(wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))))
  3bitr4d(wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))), wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))))
  a1i(wss(c0, c1), wb(wa(wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))))
  anass(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))
  anbi1d(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1)))
  pm4.71d(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1))
  ssel(c0, c1, cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))
  a1i(wss(c0, c1), wb(wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2)))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  an12(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))
  anbi2i(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))))
  elxp7(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  an12(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c2))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c2))), c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cima(ccnv(c1st), c0), cxp(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c1st), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c2))), c0), cin(cima(ccnv(c1st), c0), cxp(c1, c2)))
  cnvresima(c1st, cxp(c1, c2), c0)
  elin(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c1st), c0), cxp(c1, c2))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c1st), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c1st), c0)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  mp2b(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c1st), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c0))), wfo(c1st, universe, universe), wfn(c1st, universe))
  fo1st()
  fofn(c1st, universe, universe)
  elpreima(c1st, universe, cv(hs0), c0)
  elxp7(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(c1, c2))), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: 2ndpreima
blocks.content: The preimage by ` 2nd ` is an 'horizontal band'. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2ndpreima(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cima(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(c2, c1))), c0), cxp(c2, c0)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cima(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(c2, c1))), c0), cxp(c2, c0), wss(c0, c1))
  3bitr4g(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(c2, c1))), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  3bitr3g(wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  syl6rbbr(wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  3bitrd(wss(c0, c1), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  anbi2d(wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  pm4.71rd(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1))
  ssel(c0, c1, cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)))
  a1i(wss(c0, c1), wb(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  bicomi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)))
  anass(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))
  a1i(wss(c0, c1), wb(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))))
  anbi1i(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1))))
  anass(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wa(wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c1))))
  elxp7(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  ancom(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))
  anass(wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(universe, universe)), wcel(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c2), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(c2, c1))), c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cima(ccnv(c2nd), c0), cxp(c2, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2nd), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1))))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(c2, c1))), c0), cin(cima(ccnv(c2nd), c0), cxp(c2, c1)))
  cnvresima(c2nd, cxp(c2, c1), c0)
  elin(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2nd), c0), cxp(c2, c1))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2nd), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cxp(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2nd), c0)), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  mp2b(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2nd), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs0)), c0))), wfo(c2nd, universe, universe), wfn(c2nd, universe))
  fo2nd()
  fofn(c2nd, universe, universe)
  elpreima(c2nd, universe, cv(hs0), c0)
  elxp7(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(cres(c2nd, cxp(c2, c1))), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c2, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: curry2ima
blocks.content: The image of a curried function with a constant second argument. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm curry2ima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)), wceq(cima(c5, c4), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, c3))))))
  -| wceq(c5, ccom(c0, ccnv(cres(c1st, cxp(universe, csn(c3))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  eqtrd(cima(c5, c4), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, c3)))), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)), wceq(cima(c5, c4), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))), wfun(c5), wss(c4, cdm(c5)))
  ffund(c5, c1, universe, w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)))
  sseqtr4d(c4, cdm(c5), c1, w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)))
  simp3(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1))
  fdmd(c5, c1, universe, w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)), wf(c5, c1, universe), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), universe), wcel(c3, c2))
  sylib(w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)), wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), universe), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  simp1(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1))
  dffn2(c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  simp2(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1))
  curry2f(c0, c1, c2, universe, c3, c5)
  dfimafn(s0, s1, c5, c4)
  abbidv(s0, w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, c3))))
  rexbidv(s1, c4, w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, c3)))
  syl6bb(w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, c3)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c0, c3), cv(s0)))
  eqeq1d(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, c3), w3a(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1)))
  3adant3(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c0, c3)))
  curry2val(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, cv(s1))
  eqcom(co(cv(s1), c0, c3), cv(s0))
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1))
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c4, c1)
  diff.w3a.s(s1, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c4, c1))
  diff.wfn.s(s1, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c4, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm curry2ima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1)→(c5 " c4)= { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s0 =(s1[c0]c3))})
  ⊣ c5 =(c0 ∘ `'(1st |`(𝕌 × { c3 })))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  eqtrd((c5 " c4), { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s0 =(s1[c0]c3))}, { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c4,(c5 ` s1)= s0)}, (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1))
  syl2anc((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1), (c5 " c4)= { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c4,(c5 ` s1)= s0)}, Fun(c5), c4 ⊆ dom(c5))
  ffund(c5, c1, universe, (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1))
  sseqtr4d(c4, dom(c5), c1, (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1))
  simp3(c0[Fn](c1 × c2), c3 ∈ c2, c4 ⊆ c1)
  fdmd(c5, c1, universe, (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1))
  syl2anc((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1), (c5 : c1 → 𝕌), (c0 :(c1 × c2)→ 𝕌), c3 ∈ c2)
  sylib((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1), (c0 :(c1 × c2)→ 𝕌), c0[Fn](c1 × c2))
  simp1(c0[Fn](c1 × c2), c3 ∈ c2, c4 ⊆ c1)
  dffn2(c0, (c1 × c2))
  simp2(c0[Fn](c1 × c2), c3 ∈ c2, c4 ⊆ c1)
  curry2f(c0, c1, c2, universe, c3, c5)
  dfimafn(s0, s1, c5, c4)
  abbidv(s0, (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1), ∃(s1 ∈ c4,(c5 ` s1)= s0), ∃(s1 ∈ c4, s0 =(s1[c0]c3)))
  rexbidv(s1, c4, (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1), (c5 ` s1)= s0, s0 =(s1[c0]c3))
  syl6bb((c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1), (c5 ` s1)= s0, s0 =(s1[c0]c3), (s1[c0]c3)= s0)
  eqeq1d((c5 ` s1), s0, (s1[c0]c3), (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ⊆ c1))
  3adant3(c0[Fn](c1 × c2), c3 ∈ c2, c4 ⊆ c1, (c5 ` s1)=(s1[c0]c3))
  curry2val(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, s1)
  eqcom((s1[c0]c3), s0)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, c0[Fn](c1 × c2), c3 ∈ c2, c4 ⊆ c1)
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, (c1 × c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c4, c1)
  diff.w3a.s(s1, c0[Fn](c1 × c2), c3 ∈ c2, c4 ⊆ c1)
  diff.wfn.s(s1, c0, (c1 × c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c1, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c3, c2)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c4, c1)
}
